name: Support Labels for functions
body: Support Labels for functions

name: Enable pass-through of secret names
body: Enable pass-through of secret names for Kubernetes back-end and future support for Docker Swarm.

name: Enable query-string to be passed through to Watchdog
0.6.6b - Automated release of Docker image and fwatchdog
body:
First automated release of Docker image and fwatchdog

Docker format is: `functions/gateway:RELEASE_TAG` - so `functions:gateway:0.6.6b`

name: Test release of Travis auto-push of Docker image
Error handling in UI
body:
Error handling in UI plus changes from: 0.6.6-beta1

Docker image: `functions/gateway:0.6.6-beta2`

name: Add "Update handler" and org rename
body:
* X-Header fix:

https://github.com/openfaas/faas/commit/d2b15241c66a797cfacf903da6f24e5991893ff9

* Swarm and external provider update function

https://github.com/openfaas/faas/pull/208#pullrequestreview-65471192

* FavIcon

https://github.com/openfaas/faas/commit/d7bc2695c32767792fb228aecadec3c654f8d7ee

Docker image: `functions/gateway:0.6.6-beta1`

name: Support metrics for external providers
body:
This release adds support for:

* metrics for external providers
* collated metrics across all gateway replicas

name: Strip watchdog binaries
body:
* Reduces size by stripping via ldflags

* Allows constraints for functions via deploy endpoint

name: Asynchronous functions
body:
Asynchronous function execution is made available via NATS Streaming
* See our new guide for instructions on how to use it - https://github.com/alexellis/faas/blob/master/guide/asynchronous.md
* PR #131

UI enhancements
* Mono-space font for request/response
* New logo and branding

name: UI Portal Branding, Swarm fix and watchdog fix
body:
**Gateway**

* UI Portal Branding

* Swarm - Allow restarts of up to 5 times with 5 sec delays for when Swarm cannot re-use a container address

**Watchdog**

* Write headers as POSIX compatible environment

I.e. X-Callback-Url becomes Http_X_Callback_Url


Samples updated by @rgee0 and docs started under /guide/ folder.

name: External provider support i.e. Kubernetes
body:
Gateway:

- Includes support for external provider via functions_provider_url environmental variable.

See also - https://github.com/alexellis/faas-netes

Watchdog:

- Write error / stack to caller.

name: Configurable gateway timeouts
body:
**Gateway**

* Configure gateway timeouts via [Leigh](https://github.com/alexellis/faas/commits/master?author=stealthybox)

Set environmental variables for `read_timeout` / `write_timeout` in seconds for the gateway service.

**Watchdog**

* Write stack traces and errors to the console

https://github.com/alexellis/faas/commit/ddc973c3418a40eb54db8461298acdb975cd7633

name: Watchdog enhancements
body:
Commit details / log:

https://github.com/alexellis/faas/commit/4d05896798e3c58677e9045c6c9d0c92013c33e7

name: (Tagging prior to 0.5.7-alpha release)
body: Tag for source history.

name: Support for private registries
body:
Watchdog - enable forwarding of HTTP headers via CGI-like env vars.
https://github.com/alexellis/faas/commit/cc0d351e696bd01aebc76a54ea0546f05bda449e

Handle private docker registry auth 
https://github.com/alexellis/faas/commit/9e711b3b5d251c4aef1bd11f7ddb4a363a05d03c

Updates to samples & documentation.

New version of `fwatchdog` binary released.

name: Enhancement to deployment and support
body:
Support features in [FaaS-CLI](http://github.com/alexellis/faas-cli)
* environmental variables
* replacing / updating functions (by delete/create)
* add X-Duration-Seconds to watchdog to track duration
* add [Swagger documentation](https://github.com/alexellis/faas/tree/master/api-docs)
* add [Github static site](https://github.com/alexellis/faas/tree/master/docs) @ http://docs.get-faas.com
* watchdog can optionally forward HTTP headers as env vars via "cgi_headers" configuration

Examples
* add Windows support via example: golang
* add COBOL example

Misc:
* Moved UI to /ui route - this could make it easier to secure via reverse proxy

name: Fixes, config changes and new ARMHF watchdog.
Updates to watchdog and function routes
body:
* Functions can now have a route including (-) dash.
* Updates and options for watchdog.
* Base / hello-world functions included in samples for more languages - dotnet/java etc.
* Base alpine function includes healthcheck functions/alpine:health

name: Enable Swarm healthchecks and fixes for watchdog
body:
Gateway

* enable DNS-RR as lookup option instead of VIP for high-load performance testing.

Watchdog

* enable lock file for use with healthcheck in binary
* document watchdog overrides
* Fixes #41

name: Optionally marshal headers to functions
body:
In order to receive the original headers from the HTTP POST you can now set the `marshal_headers` env variable to `true`. The function/gateway:0.6 image will also be needed.

The header and body will be passed to the function as Golang-formatted JSON which can be decoded.

See new sample function: ApiKeyProtected for an example.

New images / binaries:
* function/gateway: 0.5.1
* watchdog binary: 0.5.1

name: Fixes and documentation.
body:
* Fixes issue #31 - Watchdog hangs for files > 64KB
* Uses Go version 1.7.5 #29
* Whitespace amended in docker-compose.yml #24

name: Improved metrics and monitoring, RR for Swarm replicas, better UI error handling.
body:
* Improved metrics and monitoring - histogram introduced, http codes
* Forced RR for task replicas to show even distribution of work
* Enhancements to UI for displaying JSON responses and better error handling.

name: UI, auto-scaling and bug fixes for defer/close
body:
Adds:
- UI portal
- Auto-scaling
- Bug fixes around defer/close
- watchdog/-armhf binary

name: Release 0.2-alpha
body:
Stable snapshot of:
- gateway
- watchdog
- sample_functions
- docker stack

New version of watchdog binary with error handling.

name: Release 0.1-alpha
body: Initial version as published on HN, Reddit and Twitter. Includes a new QuickStart guide and images on the Hub.
